58 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
75 VolOctree::VolOctree(MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize)
76  : VolumeKernel(communicator, haloSize, false)
77 #else
81 VolOctree::VolOctree()
82  : VolumeKernel(false)
83 #endif
84 {
85  // Create the tree
86 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
87  m_tree = std::unique_ptr<PabloUniform>(new PabloUniform(PabloUniform::DEFAULT_LOG_FILE, communicator));
88 #else
89  m_tree = std::unique_ptr<PabloUniform>(new PabloUniform(PabloUniform::DEFAULT_LOG_FILE));
90 #endif
91 
92  // Initialize the tree
93 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
94  initializeTree(nullptr, haloSize);
95 #else
96  initializeTree(nullptr);
97 #endif
98 
99  // Initialize the patch
100  initialize();
101 
102  // Reset
103  //
104  // The function that resets the patch is virtual, but since is called
105  // from the constructor of the patch kernel only the base function is
106  // called.
107  __reset(false);
108 }

148 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
170 VolOctree::VolOctree(int id, int dimension, const std::array<double, 3> &origin, double length, double dh, MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize)
171  : VolumeKernel(id, dimension, communicator, haloSize, false)
172 #else
182 VolOctree::VolOctree(int id, int dimension, const std::array<double, 3> &origin, double length, double dh)
183  : VolumeKernel(id, dimension, false)
184 #endif
185 {
186  // Create the tree
187 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
188  m_tree = std::unique_ptr<PabloUniform>(
189  new PabloUniform(origin[0], origin[1], origin[2], length, dimension,
190  PabloUniform::DEFAULT_LOG_FILE, communicator));
191 #else
192  m_tree = std::unique_ptr<PabloUniform>(
193  new PabloUniform(origin[0], origin[1], origin[2], length, dimension,
194  PabloUniform::DEFAULT_LOG_FILE));
195 #endif
196 
197  // Initialize the tree
198 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
199  initializeTree(nullptr, haloSize);
200 #else
201  initializeTree(nullptr);
202 #endif
203 
204  // Initialize the patch
205  initialize();
206 
207  // Reset
208  //
209  // The function that resets the patch is virtual, but since is called
210  // from the constructor of the patch kernel only the base function is
211  // called.
212  __reset(false);
213 
214  // Set the dimension
215  //
216  // The function that sets the dimension is virtual, but since is called
217  // from the constructor of the patch kernel only the base function is
218  // called.
219  __setDimension(dimension);
220 
221  // Set the bounding
222  setBoundingBox();
223 
224  // Initialize refinement markers
225  if (m_tree->getNumOctants() > 0) {
226  double initial_level = ceil(log2(std::max(1., length / dh)));
227  m_tree->setMarker((uint32_t) 0, initial_level);
228  }
229 }

244 VolOctree::VolOctree(std::istream &stream, MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize)
245  : VolumeKernel(communicator, haloSize, false)
246 #else
252 VolOctree::VolOctree(std::istream &stream)
253  : VolumeKernel(false)
254 #endif
255 {
256  // Initialize the tree
257 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
258  initializeTree(nullptr, haloSize);
259 #else
260  initializeTree(nullptr);
261 #endif
262 
263  // Initialize the patch
264  initialize();
265 
266  // Restore the patch
267  restore(stream);
268 }

294 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
299 #endif
305 VolOctree::VolOctree(int id, std::unique_ptr<PabloUniform> &&tree, std::unique_ptr<PabloUniform> *adopter)
306 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
307  : VolumeKernel(id, tree->getDim(), tree->getComm(), tree->getNofGhostLayers(), false)
308 #else
309  : VolumeKernel(id, tree->getDim(), false)
310 #endif
311 {
312  // Associate the tree
313  assert(tree);
314  m_tree.swap(tree);
315 
316  // Initialize the tree
317 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
318  initializeTree(adopter, m_tree->getNofGhostLayers());
319 #else
320  initializeTree(adopter);
321 #endif
322 
323  // Initialize the patch
324  initialize();
325 
326  // Reset
327  //
328  // The function that resets the patch is virtual, but since is called
329  // from the constructor of the patch kernel only the base function is
330  // called.
331  __reset(false);
332 
333  // Set the dimension
334  //
335  // The function that sets the dimension is virtual, but since is called
336  // from the constructor of the patch kernel only the base function is
337  // called.
338  __setDimension(m_tree->getDim());
339 }

346 VolOctree::VolOctree(const VolOctree &other)
347  : VolumeKernel(other)
348 {
349  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex = other.m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex;
350  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge = other.m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge;
351  m_octantLocalEdgesOnVertex = other.m_octantLocalEdgesOnVertex;
352 
353  m_cellTypeInfo = other.m_cellTypeInfo;
354  m_interfaceTypeInfo = other.m_interfaceTypeInfo;
355 
356  m_cellToOctant = other.m_cellToOctant;
357  m_cellToGhost = other.m_cellToGhost;
358  m_octantToCell = other.m_octantToCell;
359  m_ghostToCell = other.m_ghostToCell;
360 
361  if (other.m_tree) {
362  m_tree = std::unique_ptr<PabloUniform>(new PabloUniform(*(other.m_tree)));
363  }
364 
365  m_treeAdopter = other.m_treeAdopter;
366 }
367 
371 VolOctree::~VolOctree()
372 {
373  if (m_treeAdopter) {
374  m_treeAdopter->swap(m_tree);
375  }
376 }

383 std::unique_ptr<PatchKernel> VolOctree::clone() const
384 {
385  return std::unique_ptr<VolOctree>(new VolOctree(*this));
386 }

391 void VolOctree::reset()
392 {
393  // Reset the patch kernel
394  VolumeKernel::reset();
395 
396  // Reset the current patch
397  __reset(true);
398 }
399 
403 void VolOctree::__reset(bool resetTree)
404 {
405  // Reset the tree
406  if (resetTree) {
407  m_tree->reset();
408  m_tree->setOrigin(std::array<double, 3>{{0., 0., 0.}});
409  m_tree->setL(1.);
410  }
411 
412  // Reset cell-to-octants maps
413  m_cellToOctant.clear();
414  m_octantToCell.clear();
415 
416  m_cellToGhost.clear();
417  m_ghostToCell.clear();
418 }
419 
425 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
430 void VolOctree::initializeTree(std::unique_ptr<PabloUniform> *adopter, std::size_t haloSize)
431 #else
432 void VolOctree::initializeTree(std::unique_ptr<PabloUniform> *adopter)
433 #endif
434 {
435 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
436  // Initialize partitioning
437  if (isCommunicatorSet()) {
438  if (!m_tree->getParallel()) {
439  // Initialize halo size
440  if (haloSize != m_tree->getNofGhostLayers()) {
441  initializeTreeHaloSize(haloSize);
442  }
443 
444  // Initialize partitioning
445  initializeTreePartitioning();
446  } else {
447  // Check if the current halo size is equal to the requested one
448  if (haloSize != m_tree->getNofGhostLayers()) {
449  throw std::runtime_error ("Unable to set the requested halo size.");
450  }
451  }
452  }
453 #endif
454 
455  // Set tree adopter
456  setTreeAdopter(adopter);
457 }
458 
462 void VolOctree::initialize()
463 {
464  log::cout() << ">> Initializing Octree mesh" << std::endl;
465 
466  // Reset the cell and interface type info
467  m_cellTypeInfo = nullptr;
468  m_interfaceTypeInfo = nullptr;
469 
470  // This patch need to be spawn
471  setSpawnStatus(SPAWN_NEEDED);
472 
473  // This patch supports adaption
474  setAdaptionStatus(ADAPTION_CLEAN);
475 
476  // Initialize the tolerance
477  //
478  // Since the patch re-implements the function to reset the tolerance,
479  // it has to explicitly initialize the tolerance.
480  resetTol();
481 
482  // Set the bounding box as frozen
483  setBoundingBoxFrozen(true);
484 }
485 
491 void VolOctree::setDimension(int dimension)
492 {
493  VolumeKernel::setDimension(dimension);
494 
495  __setDimension(dimension);
496 }
497 
503 void VolOctree::__setDimension(int dimension)
504 {
505  if (m_tree->getDim() > 0 && dimension != m_tree->getDim()) {
506  throw std::runtime_error ("The dimension does not match the dimension of the octree.");
507  }
508 
509  // Initialize local edges/vertex/faces association
510  std::vector<std::vector<int>>().swap(m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex);
511  std::vector<std::vector<int>>().swap(m_octantLocalEdgesOnVertex);
512  std::vector<std::vector<int>>().swap(m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge);
513 
514  if (dimension == 3) {
515  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.reserve(8);
516  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.push_back({{0, 2, 4}});
517  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.push_back({{1, 2, 4}});
518  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.push_back({{0, 3, 4}});
519  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.push_back({{1, 3, 4}});
520  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.push_back({{0, 2, 5}});
521  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.push_back({{1, 2, 5}});
522  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.push_back({{0, 3, 5}});
523  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.push_back({{1, 3, 5}});
524 
525  m_octantLocalEdgesOnVertex.reserve(8);
526  m_octantLocalEdgesOnVertex.push_back({{0, 2, 4}});
527  m_octantLocalEdgesOnVertex.push_back({{1, 2, 5}});
528  m_octantLocalEdgesOnVertex.push_back({{0, 3, 6}});
529  m_octantLocalEdgesOnVertex.push_back({{1, 3, 7}});
530  m_octantLocalEdgesOnVertex.push_back({{4, 8, 10}});
531  m_octantLocalEdgesOnVertex.push_back({{5, 9, 10}});
532  m_octantLocalEdgesOnVertex.push_back({{6, 8, 11}});
533  m_octantLocalEdgesOnVertex.push_back({{7, 9, 11}});
534 
535  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge.reserve(12);
536  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge.push_back({{0, 4}});
537  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge.push_back({{1, 4}});
538  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge.push_back({{2, 4}});
539  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge.push_back({{3, 4}});
540  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge.push_back({{0, 2}});
541  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge.push_back({{1, 2}});
542  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge.push_back({{0, 3}});
543  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge.push_back({{1, 3}});
544  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge.push_back({{0, 5}});
545  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge.push_back({{1, 5}});
546  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge.push_back({{2, 5}});
547  m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge.push_back({{3, 5}});
548  } else {
549  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.reserve(4);
550  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.push_back({{0, 2}});
551  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.push_back({{1, 2}});
552  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.push_back({{0, 3}});
553  m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex.push_back({{1, 3}});
554  }
555 
556  // Info of the cell type
557  ElementType cellType;
558  if (dimension == 3) {
559  cellType = ElementType::VOXEL;
560  } else {
561  cellType = ElementType::PIXEL;
562  }
563 
564  m_cellTypeInfo = &ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(cellType);
565 
566  // Info on the interface type
567  ElementType interfaceType;
568  if (dimension == 3) {
569  interfaceType = ElementType::PIXEL;
570  } else {
571  interfaceType = ElementType::LINE;
572  }
573 
574  m_interfaceTypeInfo = &ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(interfaceType);
575 }
576 
580 void VolOctree::setBoundingBox()
581 {
582  std::array<double, 3> minPoint;
583  std::array<double, 3> maxPoint;
584 
585  // Get the bounding box from the tree
586  m_tree->getBoundingBox(minPoint, maxPoint);
587 
588 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
589  // The tree is only evaluating the bounding box of the internal octants,
590  // we need to consider also ghosts cells.
591  for (auto ghostCellItr = ghostCellBegin(); ghostCellItr != ghostCellEnd(); ++ghostCellItr) {
592  ConstProxyVector<long> ghostVertexIds = ghostCellItr->getVertexIds();
593  int nGhostCellVertices = ghostVertexIds.size();
594  for (int i = 0; i < nGhostCellVertices; ++i) {
595  const std::array<double, 3> coords = m_vertices[ghostVertexIds[i]].getCoords();
596  for (int d = 0; d < 3; ++d) {
597  minPoint[d] = std::min(coords[d], minPoint[d]);
598  maxPoint[d] = std::max(coords[d], maxPoint[d]);
599  }
600  }
601  }
602 #endif
603 
604  // Set the bounding box
605  setBoundingBox(minPoint, maxPoint);
606 }
607 
618 void VolOctree::simulateCellUpdate(long id, adaption::Marker marker, std::vector<Cell> *virtualCells, PiercedVector<Vertex, long> *virtualVertices) const
619 {
620  // Get virtual post-update octants
621  OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(id);
622  const Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
623 
624  int8_t markerValue;
625  switch (marker) {
626 
627  case adaption::MARKER_COARSEN:
628  markerValue = -1;
629  break;
630 
631  case adaption::MARKER_REFINE:
632  markerValue = 1;
633  break;
634 
635  default:
636  markerValue = 0;
637 
638  }
639 
640  int nMaxVirtualOctants;
641  if (getDimension() == 3) {
642  nMaxVirtualOctants = 8;
643  } else {
644  nMaxVirtualOctants = 4;
645  }
646 
647  std::vector<Octant> virtualOctants;
648  virtualOctants.reserve(nMaxVirtualOctants);
649  m_tree->expectedOctantAdapt(octant, markerValue, &virtualOctants);
650  std::size_t nVirtualOctants = virtualOctants.size();
651 
652  // Create virtual post-update cells
653  int nCellVertices = m_cellTypeInfo->nVertices;
654 
655  virtualVertices->clear();
656  virtualVertices->reserve(nCellVertices * nVirtualOctants);
657 
658  virtualCells->clear();
659  virtualCells->resize(nVirtualOctants);
660 
661  for (std::size_t k = 0; k < nVirtualOctants; ++k) {
662  const Octant *virtualOctant = &(virtualOctants[k]);
663 
664  std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[nCellVertices]);
665  for (int i = 0; i < nCellVertices; ++i) {
666  long vertexId = k * nCellVertices + i;
667  connectStorage[i] = vertexId;
668  virtualVertices->emplaceBack(vertexId, vertexId, m_tree->getNode(virtualOctant, i));
669  }
670 
671  virtualCells->emplace_back(id, m_cellTypeInfo->type, std::move(connectStorage), true, false);
672  }
673 }
674 
681 double VolOctree::evalCellVolume(long id) const
682 {
683  OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(id);
684  const Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
685 
686  return m_tree->getVolume(octant);
687 }

695 std::array<double, 3> VolOctree::evalCellCentroid(long id) const
696 {
697  OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(id);
698  const Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
699 
700  return m_tree->getCenter(octant);
701 }

710 void VolOctree::evalCellBoundingBox(long id, std::array<double,3> *minPoint, std::array<double,3> *maxPoint) const
711 {
712  OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(id);
713  const Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
714 
715  *minPoint = m_tree->getNode(octant, 0);
716  *maxPoint = m_tree->getNode(octant, m_cellTypeInfo->nVertices - 1);
717 }

739 double VolOctree::evalInterfaceArea(long id) const
740 {
741  const Interface &interface = getInterface(id);
742  long owner = interface.getOwner();
743 
744  OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(owner);
745  const Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
746 
747  return m_tree->getArea(octant);

756 std::array<double, 3> VolOctree::evalInterfaceNormal(long id) const
757 {
758  const Interface &interface = getInterface(id);
759  int ownerFace = interface.getOwnerFace();
760  long owner = interface.getOwner();
761 
762  OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(owner);
763  const Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
764 
765  return m_tree->getNormal(octant, (uint8_t) ownerFace);
766 }
767 
774 VolOctree::OctantInfo VolOctree::getCellOctant(long id) const
775 {
776  // Search the cell among the internal octants
777  auto octantItr = m_cellToOctant.find(id);
778  if (octantItr != m_cellToOctant.end()) {
779  return OctantInfo(octantItr->second, true);
780  }
781 
782  // Search the cell among the ghosts
783  return OctantInfo(m_cellToGhost.at(id), false);
784 }

791 PabloUniform & VolOctree::getTree()
792 {
793  return *m_tree;

801 const PabloUniform & VolOctree::getTree() const
802 {
803  return *m_tree;

814  m_treeAdopter = adopter;

816 
823 long VolOctree::getOctantId(const OctantInfo &octantInfo) const
824 {
825  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, long>::const_iterator octantItr;
826  if (octantInfo.internal) {
827  octantItr = m_octantToCell.find(octantInfo.id);
828  if (octantItr == m_octantToCell.end()) {
829  return Element::NULL_ID;
830  }
831  } else {
832  octantItr = m_ghostToCell.find(octantInfo.id);
833  if (octantItr == m_ghostToCell.end()) {
834  return Element::NULL_ID;
835  }
836  }
837 
838  return octantItr->second;
839 }
840 
847 Octant * VolOctree::getOctantPointer(const OctantInfo &octantInfo)
848 {
849  Octant *octant;
850  if (octantInfo.internal) {
851  octant = m_tree->getOctant(octantInfo.id);
852  } else {
853  octant = m_tree->getGhostOctant(octantInfo.id);
854  }
855 
856  return octant;
857 }
858 
865 const Octant * VolOctree::getOctantPointer(const OctantInfo &octantInfo) const
866 {
867  const Octant *octant;
868  if (octantInfo.internal) {
869  octant = m_tree->getOctant(octantInfo.id);
870  } else {
871  octant = m_tree->getGhostOctant(octantInfo.id);
872  }
873 
874  return octant;
875 }
876 
883 VolOctree::OctantHash VolOctree::evaluateOctantHash(const OctantInfo &octantInfo)
884 {
885  uint8_t level = m_tree->getLevel(octantInfo.id);
886  uint64_t morton = m_tree->getMorton(octantInfo.id);
887 
888  OctantHash octantHash;
889  octantHash |= morton;
890  octantHash <<= 8;
891  octantHash |= level;
892 
893  return octantHash;
894 }
895 
902 int VolOctree::getCellLevel(long id) const
903 {
904  OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(id);
905 
906  const Octant* octant;
907  if (octantInfo.internal) {
908  octant = m_tree->getOctant(octantInfo.id);
909  } else {
910  octant = m_tree->getGhostOctant(octantInfo.id);
911  }
912  return m_tree->getLevel(octant);
913 }

921 int VolOctree::getCellFamilySplitLocalVertex(long id) const
922 {
923  OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(id);
924  const Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
925 
926  return m_tree->getFamilySplittingNode(octant);

928 
936 std::vector<adaption::Info> VolOctree::_spawn(bool trackSpawn)
937 {
938  std::vector<adaption::Info> updateInfo;
939 
940  // Perform initial import
941  if (empty()) {
942  m_tree->adapt();
943  updateInfo = sync(trackSpawn);
944  }
945 
946  return updateInfo;
947 }
948 
960 std::vector<adaption::Info> VolOctree::_adaptionPrepare(bool trackAdaption)
961 {
962  BITPIT_UNUSED(trackAdaption);
963 
964  if (getSpawnStatus() == SPAWN_NEEDED) {
965  throw std::runtime_error ("The initial import has not been performed.");
966  }
967 
968  // Call pre-adapt routine
969  m_tree->preadapt();
970 
971  // Track adaption changes
972  adaption::InfoCollection adaptionData;
973  if (trackAdaption) {
974  // Current rank
975  int currentRank = -1;
976 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
977  currentRank = getRank();
978 #endif
979 
980  // Track internal and ghosts octants that will be coarsend/refined
981  std::vector<uint32_t> treeIds;
982  std::vector<int8_t> treeMarkers;
983  std::vector<bool> treeGhosts;
984  m_tree->getPreMapping(treeIds, treeMarkers, treeGhosts);
985  std::size_t nUpdatedOctants = treeIds.size();
986 
987  adaption::Info *adaptionInfo = nullptr;
988  uint64_t previousFatherMorton = PABLO::INVALID_MORTON;
989  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nUpdatedOctants; ++n) {
990  OctantInfo octantInfo(treeIds[n], !treeGhosts[n]);
991  Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
992 
993  adaption::Type adaptionType;
994  if (treeMarkers[n] > 0) {
995  adaptionType = adaption::TYPE_REFINEMENT;
996  } else {
997  adaptionType = adaption::TYPE_COARSENING;
998  }
999 
1000  bool createAdaption = true;
1001  if (adaptionType == adaption::TYPE_COARSENING) {
1002  uint64_t fatherMorton = octant->computeFatherMorton();
1003  if (fatherMorton == previousFatherMorton) {
1004  createAdaption = false;
1005  } else {
1006  previousFatherMorton = fatherMorton;
1007  }
1008  }
1009 
1010  if (createAdaption) {
1011  std::size_t adaptionInfoId = adaptionData.create(adaptionType, adaption::ENTITY_CELL, currentRank);
1012  adaptionInfo = &(adaptionData[adaptionInfoId]);
1013  }
1014 
1015  assert(adaptionInfo);
1016  adaptionInfo->previous.emplace_back();
1017  long &cellId = adaptionInfo->previous.back();
1018  cellId = getOctantId(octantInfo);
1019  }
1020 
1021 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1022  // Ghost cells will be removed
1023  if (isPartitioned() && getGhostCellCount() > 0) {
1024  std::size_t adaptionInfoId = adaptionData.create(adaption::TYPE_DELETION, adaption::ENTITY_CELL, currentRank);
1025  adaption::Info &adaptionInfo = adaptionData[adaptionInfoId];
1026  adaptionInfo.previous.reserve(getGhostCellCount());
1027  for (auto itr = ghostCellBegin(); itr != ghostCellEnd(); ++itr) {
1028  adaptionInfo.previous.emplace_back();
1029  long &deletedGhostCellId = adaptionInfo.previous.back();
1030  deletedGhostCellId = itr.getId();
1031  }
1032  }
1033 #endif
1034  }
1035 
1036  return adaptionData.dump();
1037 }
1038 
1048 std::vector<adaption::Info> VolOctree::_adaptionAlter(bool trackAdaption)
1049 {
1050  // Updating the tree
1051  log::cout() << ">> Adapting tree...";
1052 
1053  bool emtpyPatch = empty();
1054  bool buildMapping = !emtpyPatch;
1055  bool updated = m_tree->adapt(buildMapping);
1056 
1057  if (!updated && !emtpyPatch) {
1058  log::cout() << " Already updated" << std::endl;
1059  return std::vector<adaption::Info>();
1060  }
1061  log::cout() << " Done" << std::endl;
1062 
1063  // Sync the patch
1064  return sync(trackAdaption);
1065 }
1066 
1070 void VolOctree::_adaptionCleanup()
1071 {
1072  // Nothing to do
1073 }
1074 
1083 void VolOctree::settleAdaptionMarkers()
1084 {
1085  m_tree->settleMarkers();
1086 }
1087 
1095 std::vector<adaption::Info> VolOctree::sync(bool trackChanges)
1096 {
1097  log::cout() << ">> Syncing patch..." << std::endl;
1098 
1099  // Detect if we are in import-from-scratch mode
1100  //
1101  // In import-from-scratch mode we start form an empty patch and we need
1102  // to import all the octants of the tree. If we are importing the tree
1103  // from scratch there are no cells to delete/renumber.
1104  bool importFromScratch = empty();
1105 
1106  // Last operation on the tree
1107  ParaTree::Operation lastTreeOperation = m_tree->getLastOperation();
1108  if (lastTreeOperation == ParaTree::OP_ADAPT_UNMAPPED && !importFromScratch) {
1109  throw std::runtime_error ("Unable to sync the patch after an unmapped adaption");
1110  }
1111 
1112  // Info on the tree
1113  long nOctants = m_tree->getNumOctants();
1114  long nPreviousOctants = m_octantToCell.size();
1115 
1116  log::cout() << ">> Number of octants : " << nOctants << std::endl;
1117 
1118  // Info on the tree
1119  long nGhostsOctants = m_tree->getNumGhosts();
1120  long nPreviousGhosts = m_ghostToCell.size();
1121 
1122  // Initialize tracking data
1123  adaption::InfoCollection adaptionData;
1124 
1125  // Current rank
1126  int currentRank = -1;
1127 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1128  currentRank = getRank();
1129 #endif
1130 
1131  // Extract information for transforming the patch
1132  //
1133  // If there are no cells in the mesh we need to import all
1134  // octants.
1135  log::cout() << ">> Extract information for transforming the patch...";
1136 
1137  std::vector<bool> unmappedOctants(nPreviousOctants, true);
1138  std::vector<OctantInfo> addedOctants;
1139  std::vector<RenumberInfo> renumberedOctants;
1140  std::vector<DeleteInfo> deletedOctants;
1141 
1142  addedOctants.reserve(nOctants + nGhostsOctants);
1143  if (!importFromScratch) {
1144  renumberedOctants.reserve(nPreviousOctants + nPreviousGhosts);
1145  deletedOctants.reserve(nPreviousOctants + nPreviousGhosts);
1146  }
1147 
1148  uint32_t treeId = 0;
1149  std::vector<uint32_t> mapper_octantMap;
1150  std::vector<bool> mapper_ghostFlag;
1151  std::vector<int> mapper_octantRank;
1152  while (treeId < (uint32_t) nOctants) {
1153  // Octant mapping
1154  mapper_octantMap.clear();
1155  mapper_ghostFlag.clear();
1156  mapper_octantRank.clear();
1157  if (!importFromScratch) {
1158  m_tree->getMapping(treeId, mapper_octantMap, mapper_ghostFlag, mapper_octantRank);
1159  }
1160 
1161  // Adaption type
1162  adaption::Type adaptionType = adaption::TYPE_NONE;
1163  if (importFromScratch) {
1164  adaptionType = adaption::TYPE_CREATION;
1165  } else if (lastTreeOperation == ParaTree::OP_ADAPT_MAPPED) {
1166  bool isNewR = m_tree->getIsNewR(treeId);
1167  if (isNewR) {
1168  adaptionType = adaption::TYPE_REFINEMENT;
1169  } else {
1170  bool isNewC = m_tree->getIsNewC(treeId);
1171  if (isNewC) {
1172  adaptionType = adaption::TYPE_COARSENING;
1173  } else if (treeId != mapper_octantMap.front()) {
1174  adaptionType = adaption::TYPE_RENUMBERING;
1175  }
1176  }
1177 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1178  } else if (lastTreeOperation == ParaTree::OP_LOADBALANCE || lastTreeOperation == ParaTree::OP_LOADBALANCE_FIRST) {
1179  if (currentRank != mapper_octantRank.front()) {
1180  adaptionType = adaption::TYPE_PARTITION_RECV;
1181  } else if (treeId != mapper_octantMap.front()) {
1182  adaptionType = adaption::TYPE_RENUMBERING;
1183  }
1184 #endif
1185  }
1186 
1187  // If the octant cell has not been modified we can skip to the next
1188  // octant.
1189  if (adaptionType == adaption::TYPE_NONE) {
1190  unmappedOctants[treeId] = false;
1191  ++treeId;
1192  continue;
1193  }
1194 
1195  // Re-numbered cells just need to be added to the proper list.
1196  //
1197  // Renumbered cells are not tracked, because the re-numbering
1198  // only happens inside VolOctree.
1199  if (adaptionType == adaption::TYPE_RENUMBERING) {
1200  uint32_t previousTreeId = mapper_octantMap.front();
1201  OctantInfo previousOctantInfo(previousTreeId, !mapper_ghostFlag.front());
1202  long cellId = getOctantId(previousOctantInfo);
1203  renumberedOctants.emplace_back(cellId, treeId);
1204  unmappedOctants[previousTreeId] = false;
1205 
1206  // No more work needed, skip to the next octant
1207  ++treeId;
1208  continue;
1209  }
1210 
1211  // Handle other kind of adaption
1212  //
1213  // New octants need to be imported into the patch,
1214  // whereas cells associated to previous octants
1215  // need to be removed.
1216  //
1217  // If the user want to track adaption, adaption
1218  // data needs to be filled.
1219 
1220  // Current tree ids that will be imported
1221  long nCurrentTreeIds;
1222  if (importFromScratch) {
1223  nCurrentTreeIds = nOctants - treeId;
1224  } else if (adaptionType == adaption::TYPE_REFINEMENT) {
1225  nCurrentTreeIds = pow(2, getDimension());
1226  } else {
1227  nCurrentTreeIds = 1;
1228  }
1229 
1230  const long lastCurrentTreeId = treeId + nCurrentTreeIds;
1231  for (int currentTreeId = treeId; currentTreeId < lastCurrentTreeId; ++currentTreeId) {
1232  addedOctants.emplace_back(currentTreeId, true);
1233  }
1234 
1235  // Cells that will be removed
1236  //
1237  // Mark the cells associated to previous local octants for deletion.
1238  if (!importFromScratch) {
1239  int nPreviousTreeIds = mapper_octantMap.size();
1240  for (int k = 0; k < nPreviousTreeIds; ++k) {
1241 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1242  // Only local cells can be deleted
1243  if (mapper_octantRank[k] != currentRank) {
1244  continue;
1245  }
1246 #endif
1247 
1248  // Ghost octants will be processed later
1249  if (mapper_ghostFlag[k]) {
1250  continue;
1251  }
1252 
1253  // Mark previous octant for deletion
1254  uint32_t previousTreeId = mapper_octantMap[k];
1255  OctantInfo previousOctantInfo(previousTreeId, !mapper_ghostFlag[k]);
1256  long cellId = getOctantId(previousOctantInfo);
1257  deletedOctants.emplace_back(cellId, adaptionType);
1258 
1259  unmappedOctants[previousTreeId] = false;
1260  }
1261  }
1262 
1263  // Adaption tracking
1264  //
1265  // The adaption info associated to the octants that has been received
1266  // from external partitions will contain the current octants sorted by
1267  // their tree id (we are looping over the octants in that order), this
1268  // is the same order that will be used on the process that has sent
1269  // the octants. Since the order is the same, the two processes are able
1270  // to exchange cell data without any additional extra communication
1271  // (they already know the list of cells for which data is needed and
1272  // the order in which these data will be sent).
1273  if (trackChanges) {
1274  // Rank assocated to the adaption info
1275  int rank = currentRank;
1276 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1277  if (adaptionType == adaption::TYPE_PARTITION_RECV) {
1278  rank = mapper_octantRank[0];
1279  }
1280 #endif
1281 
1282  // Get the adaption info
1283  std::size_t infoId = adaptionData.create(adaptionType, adaption::ENTITY_CELL, rank);
1284  adaption::Info &adaptionInfo = adaptionData[infoId];
1285 
1286  // Current status
1287  //
1288  // We don't know the id of the current status, because those
1289  // cells are not yet in the mesh. Store the trre id, and
1290  // make the translation later.
1291  //
1292  // WARNING: tree id are uint32_t wherase adaptionInfo stores
1293  // id as long.
1294  adaptionInfo.current.reserve(nCurrentTreeIds);
1295  auto addedOctantsIter = addedOctants.cend() - nCurrentTreeIds;
1296  while (addedOctantsIter != addedOctants.cend()) {
1297  adaptionInfo.current.emplace_back();
1298  long &adaptionId = adaptionInfo.current.back();
1299  adaptionId = (*addedOctantsIter).id;
1300 
1301  addedOctantsIter++;
1302  }
1303 
1304  // Previous cells
1305  //
1306  // A coarsening can merge togheter cells of different processes.
1307  // However, since the coarsening is limited to one level, the
1308  // previous cells will always be internal or among the ghost of
1309  // the current process.
1310  int nPreviousCellIds = mapper_octantMap.size();
1311  adaptionInfo.previous.reserve(nPreviousCellIds);
1312  for (int k = 0; k < nPreviousCellIds; ++k) {
1313  long previousCellId;
1314 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1315  if (mapper_octantRank[k] != currentRank) {
1316  previousCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
1317  } else
1318 #endif
1319  {
1320  OctantInfo previousOctantInfo(mapper_octantMap[k], !mapper_ghostFlag[k]);
1321  previousCellId = getOctantId(previousOctantInfo);
1322  }
1323 
1324  adaptionInfo.previous.emplace_back();
1325  long &adaptionId = adaptionInfo.previous.back();
1326  adaptionId = previousCellId;
1327  }
1328  }
1329 
1330  // Incremente tree id
1331  treeId += nCurrentTreeIds;
1332  }
1333 
1334  log::cout() << " Done" << std::endl;
1335 
1336 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1337  // New ghost octants need to be added
1338  for (uint32_t treeId = 0; treeId < (uint32_t) nGhostsOctants; ++treeId) {
1339  addedOctants.emplace_back(treeId, false);
1340  }
1341 #endif
1342 
1343  // Remove octants that are no more in the tree
1344  if (!importFromScratch) {
1345 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1346  // Cells that have been send to other processes need to be removed
1347  PabloUniform::LoadBalanceRanges loadBalanceRanges = m_tree->getLoadBalanceRanges();
1348  for (const auto &rankEntry : loadBalanceRanges.sendRanges) {
1349  int rank = rankEntry.first;
1350  if (rank == currentRank) {
1351  continue;
1352  }
1353 
1354  adaption::Type deletionType;
1355  if (loadBalanceRanges.sendAction == PabloUniform::LoadBalanceRanges::ACTION_DELETE) {
1356  deletionType = adaption::TYPE_DELETION;
1357  } else {
1358  deletionType = adaption::TYPE_PARTITION_SEND;
1359  }
1360 
1361  uint32_t beginTreeId = rankEntry.second[0];
1362  uint32_t endTreeId = rankEntry.second[1];
1363  for (uint32_t treeId = beginTreeId; treeId < endTreeId; ++treeId) {
1364  OctantInfo octantInfo(treeId, true);
1365  long cellId = getOctantId(octantInfo);
1366  deletedOctants.emplace_back(cellId, deletionType, rank);
1367  unmappedOctants[treeId] = false;
1368  }
1369  }
1370 
1371  // Previous ghosts cells need to be removed
1372  if (nPreviousGhosts > 0) {
1373  for (uint32_t ghostTreeId = 0; ghostTreeId < nPreviousGhosts; ++ghostTreeId) {
1374  OctantInfo ghostOctantInfo(ghostTreeId, false);
1375  long ghostCellId = getOctantId(ghostOctantInfo);
1376  deletedOctants.emplace_back(ghostCellId, adaption::TYPE_DELETION);
1377  }
1378  }
1379 #endif
1380 
1381  // Remove unmapped octants
1382  //
1383  // A coarsening that merges cells from different processes, can leave, on
1384  // the processes which own the ghost octants involved in the coarsening,
1385  // some octants that are not mapped.
1386  for (uint32_t previousTreeId = 0; previousTreeId < nPreviousOctants; ++previousTreeId) {
1387  if (unmappedOctants[previousTreeId]) {
1388  OctantInfo octantInfo = OctantInfo(previousTreeId, true);
1389  long cellId = getOctantId(octantInfo);
1390  deletedOctants.emplace_back(cellId, adaption::TYPE_DELETION);
1391  }
1392  }
1393  }
1394 
1395  // Enable advanced editing
1396  setExpert(true);
1397 
1398  // Renumber cells
1399  renumberCells(renumberedOctants);
1400 
1401  // Remove deleted cells
1402  StitchInfo stitchInfo;
1403  if (deletedOctants.size() > 0) {
1404  log::cout() << ">> Removing non-existing cells...";
1405 
1406  // Track changes
1407  //
1408  // The adaption info associated to the octants that has been sent
1409  // to external partitions will contain the current octants sorted by
1410  // their tree id (they were added to the deleted octants list in that
1411  // order), this is the same order that will be used on the process
1412  // that has received the octants. Since the order is the same, the two
1413  // processes are able to exchange cell data without any additional
1414  // extra communication (they already know the list of cells for which
1415  // data is needed and the order in which these data will be sent).
1416  if (trackChanges) {
1417  // Track deleted cells
1418  std::unordered_set<long> sendAdaptionInfo;
1419  std::unordered_set<long> removedInterfaces;
1420  for (const DeleteInfo &deleteInfo : deletedOctants) {
1421  // Cell id
1422  long cellId = deleteInfo.cellId;
1423 
1424  // Adaption tracking
1425  //
1426  // Only cells deleted from a real deletion or a partition send
1427  // needs to be tracked here, the other cells will be tracked
1428  // where the adaption that deleted the cell is tracked.
1429  adaption::Type adaptionType = deleteInfo.trigger;
1430  bool adaptionIsDeletion = (adaptionType == adaption::TYPE_DELETION);
1431  bool adaptionIsSend = (adaptionType == adaption::TYPE_PARTITION_SEND);
1432 
1433  if (adaptionIsDeletion || adaptionIsSend) {
1434  int rank = deleteInfo.rank;
1435  std::size_t adaptionInfoId = adaptionData.create(adaptionType, adaption::ENTITY_CELL, rank);
1436  adaption::Info &adaptionInfo = adaptionData[adaptionInfoId];
1437  adaptionInfo.previous.emplace_back();
1438  long &deletedId = adaptionInfo.previous.back();
1439  deletedId = cellId;
1440 
1441  // Keep track of adaption info for the send cells
1442  if (adaptionIsSend) {
1443  sendAdaptionInfo.insert(adaptionInfoId);
1444  }
1445  }
1446 
1447  // List of deleted interfaces
1448  const Cell &cell = m_cells.at(cellId);
1449  long nCellInterfaces = cell.getInterfaceCount();
1450  const long *interfaces = cell.getInterfaces();
1451  for (int k = 0; k < nCellInterfaces; ++k) {
1452  long interfaceId = interfaces[k];
1453  if (interfaceId >= 0) {
1454  removedInterfaces.insert(interfaceId);
1455  }
1456  }
1457  }
1458 
1459 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1460  // Sort sent cells
1461  //
1462  // We cannot use native functions to evaluate the position of the
1463  // cells because the octants associated to the cells no longer
1464  // exist on the octree. The cells are still there, therefore we
1465  // can evaluate the cell positions using generic patch functions.
1466  for (int adaptionInfoId : sendAdaptionInfo) {
1467  adaption::Info &adaptionInfo = adaptionData[adaptionInfoId];
1468  std::sort(adaptionInfo.previous.begin(), adaptionInfo.previous.end(), CellPositionLess(*this, false));
1469  }
1470 #endif
1471 
1472  // Adaption info for the deleted interfaces
1473  std::size_t adaptionInfoId = adaptionData.create(adaption::TYPE_DELETION, adaption::ENTITY_INTERFACE, currentRank);
1474  adaption::Info &adaptionInfo = adaptionData[adaptionInfoId];
1475  adaptionInfo.previous.reserve(removedInterfaces.size());
1476  for (long interfaceId : removedInterfaces) {
1477  adaptionInfo.previous.emplace_back();
1478  long &deletedInterfaceId = adaptionInfo.previous.back();
1479  deletedInterfaceId = interfaceId;
1480  }
1481  }
1482 
1483  // Delete cells
1484  stitchInfo = deleteCells(deletedOctants);
1485 
1486  log::cout() << " Done" << std::endl;
1487  log::cout() << ">> Cells removed: " << deletedOctants.size() << std::endl;
1488  }
1489 
1490  std::vector<DeleteInfo>().swap(deletedOctants);
1491 
1492  // Import added cells
1493  std::vector<long> createdCells;
1494  if (addedOctants.size() > 0) {
1495  log::cout() << ">> Importing new octants...";
1496 
1497  createdCells = importCells(addedOctants, stitchInfo);
1498 
1499  log::cout() << " Done" << std::endl;
1500  log::cout() << ">> Octants imported: " << addedOctants.size() << std::endl;
1501  }
1502 
1503  StitchInfo().swap(stitchInfo);
1504 
1505  // Disable advanced editing
1506  setExpert(false);
1507 
1508  // Track mesh adaption
1509  if (trackChanges) {
1510  // Complete mesh adaption info for the cells
1511  for (auto &adaptionInfo : adaptionData.data()) {
1512  if (adaptionInfo.entity != adaption::ENTITY_CELL) {
1513  continue;
1514  }
1515 
1516  // Map ids of the added cells
1517  int nCurrentIds = adaptionInfo.current.size();
1518  for (int k = 0; k < nCurrentIds; ++k) {
1519  long cellId = m_octantToCell.at(adaptionInfo.current[k]);
1520  adaptionInfo.current[k] = cellId;
1521  }
1522 
1523 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1524  // Sort received cells
1525  //
1526  // To match the sorting done on the procesor that sent the cells,
1527  // we don't use the native functions to evaluate the position of
1528  // the cells.
1529  adaption::Type adaptionType = adaptionInfo.type;
1530  if (adaptionType == adaption::TYPE_PARTITION_RECV) {
1531  std::sort(adaptionInfo.current.begin(), adaptionInfo.current.end(), CellPositionLess(*this, false));
1532  }
1533 #endif
1534  }
1535 
1536 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1537  // Track created ghosts cells
1538  if (nGhostsOctants > 0) {
1539  std::size_t adaptionInfoId = adaptionData.create(adaption::TYPE_CREATION, adaption::ENTITY_CELL, currentRank);
1540  adaption::Info &adaptionInfo = adaptionData[adaptionInfoId];
1541 
1542  adaptionInfo.current.reserve(nGhostsOctants);
1543  auto cellIterator = m_cellToGhost.cbegin();
1544  while (cellIterator != m_cellToGhost.cend()) {
1545  adaptionInfo.current.emplace_back();
1546  long &adaptionId = adaptionInfo.current.back();
1547  adaptionId = cellIterator->first;
1548 
1549  cellIterator++;
1550  }
1551  }
1552 #endif
1553 
1554  // Track created interfaces
1555  if (createdCells.size() > 0) {
1556  // List of unique interfaces that have been created
1557  std::unordered_set<long> createdInterfaces;
1558  for (const auto &cellId : createdCells) {
1559  const Cell &cell = m_cells.at(cellId);
1560  long nCellInterfaces = cell.getInterfaceCount();
1561  const long *interfaces = cell.getInterfaces();
1562  for (int k = 0; k < nCellInterfaces; ++k) {
1563  long interfaceId = interfaces[k];
1564  if (interfaceId >= 0) {
1565  createdInterfaces.insert(interfaceId);
1566  }
1567  }
1568  }
1569 
1570  // Adaption info
1571  std::size_t infoId = adaptionData.create(adaption::TYPE_CREATION, adaption::ENTITY_INTERFACE, currentRank);
1572  adaption::Info &adaptionInfo = adaptionData[infoId];
1573  adaptionInfo.current.reserve(createdInterfaces.size());
1574  for (long interfaceId : createdInterfaces) {
1575  adaptionInfo.current.emplace_back();
1576  long &createdInterfaceId = adaptionInfo.current.back();
1577  createdInterfaceId = interfaceId;
1578  }
1579  }
1580  }
1581 
1582  // Done
1583  return adaptionData.dump();
1584 }
1585 
1586 
1595 VolOctree::StitchInfo VolOctree::deleteCells(const std::vector<DeleteInfo> &deletedOctants)
1596 {
1597  // Info of the cells
1598  int nCellVertices = m_cellTypeInfo->nVertices;
1599 
1600  // Info on the faces
1601  int nInterfaceVertices = m_interfaceTypeInfo->nVertices;
1602 
1603  // Delete the cells
1604  std::unordered_set<long> deadVertices;
1605 
1606  std::vector<long> deadCells;
1607  deadCells.reserve(deletedOctants.size());
1608  for (const DeleteInfo &deleteInfo : deletedOctants) {
1609  long cellId = deleteInfo.cellId;
1610  const Cell &cell = m_cells[cellId];
1611 
1612  // List vertices to remove
1613  //
1614  // For now, all cell vertices will be listed. Later, the vertex of
1615  // the dangling faces will be removed from the list.
1616  ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
1617  for (int k = 0; k < nCellVertices; ++k) {
1618  long vertexId = cellVertexIds[k];
1619  deadVertices.insert(vertexId);
1620  }
1621 
1622  // Remove patch-tree associations
1623  const OctantInfo &octantInfo = getCellOctant(cellId);
1624  uint32_t treeId = octantInfo.id;
1625 
1626  if (cell.isInterior()) {
1627  m_cellToOctant.erase(cellId);
1628 
1629  auto octantToCellItr = m_octantToCell.find(treeId);
1630  if (octantToCellItr->second == cellId) {
1631  m_octantToCell.erase(octantToCellItr);
1632  }
1633  } else {
1634  m_cellToGhost.erase(cellId);
1635 
1636  auto ghostToCellItr = m_ghostToCell.find(treeId);
1637  if (ghostToCellItr->second == cellId) {
1638  m_ghostToCell.erase(ghostToCellItr);
1639  }
1640  }
1641 
1642  // Cell needs to be removed
1643  deadCells.push_back(cellId);
1644  }
1645 
1646  PatchKernel::deleteCells(deadCells);
1647 
1648  // Prune cell adjacencies and interfaces
1649  //
1650  // At this stage we cannot fully update adjacencies and interfaces, but
1651  // we need to remove stale adjacencies and interfaces.
1652  pruneStaleAdjacencies();
1653 
1654  pruneStaleInterfaces();
1655 
1656  // All the vertices belonging to the dangling cells has to be kept
1657  //
1658  // The vertices of the dangling faces need to be kept because there are
1659  // still cells using them. However it's not enough to consider only the
1660  // vertices on the dangling faces, we have to consider the vertices of
1661  // the whole cell. That's because we may need to keep vertices on the
1662  // edges of the cell, and those vertices may not be on interfaces of the
1663  // dangling faces.
1664  //
1665  // Morover we need to build a map between the patch numbering and the
1666  // octree numbering of the vertices of the dangling cells. This map will
1667  // be used when imprting the octants to stitch the imported octants to
1668  // the existing cells.
1669  StitchInfo stitchVertices;
1670  for (const auto &entry: m_alteredCells) {
1671  if (!testAlterationFlags(entry.second, FLAG_DANGLING)) {
1672  continue;
1673  }
1674 
1675  // Vertices of the cell
1676  long cellId = entry.first;
1677  const Cell &cell = m_cells[cellId];
1678  ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
1679 
1680  OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(cellId);
1681  Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
1682 
1683  for (int k = 0; k < nCellVertices; ++k) {
1684  long vertexId = cellVertexIds[k];
1685  uint64_t vertexTreeMorton = m_tree->getNodeMorton(octant, k);
1686  stitchVertices.insert({vertexTreeMorton, vertexId});
1687  deadVertices.erase(vertexId);
1688  }
1689 
1690  // Vertices of all other interfaces left of the cell
1691  int nCellInterfaces = cell.getInterfaceCount();
1692  const long *interfaces = cell.getInterfaces();
1693  for (int i = 0; i < nCellInterfaces; ++i) {
1694  long interfaceId = interfaces[i];
1695  if (interfaceId < 0) {
1696  continue;
1697  }
1698 
1699  const Interface &interface = m_interfaces[interfaceId];
1700  if (interface.isBorder()) {
1701  continue;
1702  }
1703 
1704  long ownerId = interface.getOwner();
1705  int ownerFace = interface.getOwnerFace();
1706 
1707  const Cell &ownerCell = m_cells[ownerId];
1708  ConstProxyVector<long> ownerCellVertexIds = ownerCell.getVertexIds();
1709 
1710  OctantInfo ownerOctantInfo = getCellOctant(ownerId);
1711  Octant *ownerOctant = getOctantPointer(ownerOctantInfo);
1712 
1713  const int *localFaceConnect = m_cellTypeInfo->faceConnectStorage[ownerFace].data();
1714  for (int k = 0; k < nInterfaceVertices; ++k) {
1715  long vertexId = ownerCellVertexIds[localFaceConnect[k]];
1716  uint64_t vertexTreeMorton = m_tree->getNodeMorton(ownerOctant, localFaceConnect[k]);
1717  stitchVertices.insert({vertexTreeMorton, vertexId});
1718  deadVertices.erase(vertexId);
1719  }
1720  }
1721  }
1722 
1723  // Delete the vertices
1724  std::vector<long> deadVerticesList(deadVertices.cbegin(), deadVertices.cend());
1725  PatchKernel::deleteVertices(deadVerticesList);
1726 
1727  // Done
1728  return stitchVertices;
1729 }
1730 
1737 void VolOctree::renumberCells(const std::vector<RenumberInfo> &renumberedOctants)
1738 {
1739  // Remove old patch-to-tree and tree-to-patch associations
1740  for (const RenumberInfo &renumberInfo : renumberedOctants) {
1741  long cellId = renumberInfo.cellId;
1742  if (!m_cells[cellId].isInterior()) {
1743  continue;
1744  }
1745 
1746  const OctantInfo &previousOctantInfo = getCellOctant(cellId);
1747  uint32_t previousTreeId = previousOctantInfo.id;
1748 
1749  m_octantToCell.erase(previousTreeId);
1750  }
1751 
1752  // Create new patch-to-tree and tree-to-patch associations
1753  for (const RenumberInfo &renumberInfo : renumberedOctants) {
1754  long cellId = renumberInfo.cellId;
1755  if (!m_cells[cellId].isInterior()) {
1756  continue;
1757  }
1758 
1759  uint32_t treeId = renumberInfo.newTreeId;
1760 
1761  m_cellToOctant[cellId] = treeId;
1762  m_octantToCell[treeId] = cellId;
1763  }
1764 }
1765 
1776 std::vector<long> VolOctree::importCells(const std::vector<OctantInfo> &octantInfoList,
1777  StitchInfo &stitchInfo, std::istream *restoreStream)
1778 {
1779  // Create the new vertices
1780  int nCellVertices = m_cellTypeInfo->nVertices;
1781  for (const OctantInfo &octantInfo : octantInfoList) {
1782  Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
1783  for (int k = 0; k < nCellVertices; ++k) {
1784  uint64_t vertexTreeMorton = m_tree->getNodeMorton(octant, k);
1785  if (stitchInfo.count(vertexTreeMorton) == 0) {
1786  // Vertex coordinates
1787  std::array<double, 3> nodeCoords = m_tree->getNode(octant, k);
1788 
1789  // Create the vertex
1790  long vertexId;
1791  if (!restoreStream) {
1792 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1793  VertexIterator vertexIterator = addVertex(std::move(nodeCoords));
1794 #else
1795  VertexIterator vertexIterator = addVertex(std::move(nodeCoords));
1796 #endif
1797  vertexId = vertexIterator.getId();
1798  } else {
1799  utils::binary::read(*restoreStream, vertexId);
1800 
1801 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1802  int rank;
1803  utils::binary::read(*restoreStream, rank);
1804 
1805  restoreVertex(std::move(nodeCoords), rank, vertexId);
1806 #else
1807  int dummtRank;
1808  utils::binary::read(*restoreStream, dummtRank);
1809 
1810  restoreVertex(std::move(nodeCoords), vertexId);
1811 #endif
1812  }
1813 
1814  // Add the vertex to the stitching info
1815  stitchInfo[vertexTreeMorton] = vertexId;
1816  }
1817  }
1818  }
1819 
1820  // Reserve space for the maps
1821  long nOctants = m_tree->getNumOctants();
1822  m_cellToOctant.reserve(nOctants);
1823  m_octantToCell.reserve(nOctants);
1824 
1825  long nGhostsOctants = m_tree->getNumGhosts();
1826  m_cellToGhost.reserve(nGhostsOctants);
1827  m_ghostToCell.reserve(nGhostsOctants);
1828 
1829  // Add the cells
1830  size_t octantInfoListSize = octantInfoList.size();
1831  m_cells.reserve(m_cells.size() + octantInfoListSize);
1832 
1833  std::vector<long> createdCells(octantInfoListSize);
1834  for (size_t i = 0; i < octantInfoListSize; ++i) {
1835  const OctantInfo &octantInfo = octantInfoList[i];
1836 
1837  // Octant connectivity
1838  Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
1839 
1840  // Cell connectivity
1841  std::unique_ptr<long[]> cellConnect = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[nCellVertices]);
1842  for (int k = 0; k < nCellVertices; ++k) {
1843  uint64_t vertexTreeMorton = m_tree->getNodeMorton(octant, k);
1844  cellConnect[k] = stitchInfo.at(vertexTreeMorton);
1845  }
1846 
1847 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1848  // Cell owner
1849  int rank;
1850  if (octantInfo.internal) {
1851  rank = getRank();
1852  } else {
1853  uint64_t globalTreeId = m_tree->getGhostGlobalIdx(octantInfo.id);
1854  rank = m_tree->getOwnerRank(globalTreeId);
1855  }
1856 #endif
1857 
1858  // Add cell
1859  long cellId;
1860  if (!restoreStream) {
1861 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1862  CellIterator cellIterator = addCell(m_cellTypeInfo->type, std::move(cellConnect), rank);
1863 #else
1864  CellIterator cellIterator = addCell(m_cellTypeInfo->type, std::move(cellConnect));
1865 #endif
1866  cellId = cellIterator.getId();
1867  } else {
1868  utils::binary::read(*restoreStream, cellId);
1869 
1870 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1871  restoreCell(m_cellTypeInfo->type, std::move(cellConnect), rank, cellId);
1872 #else
1873  restoreCell(m_cellTypeInfo->type, std::move(cellConnect), cellId);
1874 #endif
1875  }
1876 
1877  // Create patch-tree associations
1878  if (octantInfo.internal) {
1879  m_cellToOctant.insert({{cellId, octantInfo.id}});
1880  m_octantToCell.insert({{octantInfo.id, cellId}});
1881  } else {
1882  m_cellToGhost.insert({{cellId, octantInfo.id}});
1883  m_ghostToCell.insert({{octantInfo.id, cellId}});
1884  }
1885 
1886  // Add the cell to the list of created cells
1887  createdCells[i] = cellId;
1888  }
1889 
1890  // Update first ghost and last internal information
1891  if (restoreStream) {
1892  updateLastInternalCellId();
1893 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1894  updateFirstGhostCellId();
1895 #endif
1896  }
1897 
1898  // Update cell PIDs
1899  if (restoreStream) {
1900  for (Cell &cell : getCells()) {
1901  int PID;
1902  utils::binary::read(*restoreStream, PID);
1903  cell.setPID(PID);
1904  }
1905  }
1906 
1907  // Update adjacencies
1908  updateAdjacencies();
1909 
1910  // Update interfaces
1911  if (!restoreStream) {
1912  updateInterfaces();
1913  }
1914 
1915  // Done
1916  return createdCells;
1917 }
1918 
1925 void VolOctree::_updateAdjacencies()
1926 {
1927  // Face information
1928  int nCellFaces = 2 * getDimension();
1929  uint8_t oppositeFace[nCellFaces];
1930  m_tree->getOppface(oppositeFace);
1931 
1932  // Count cells with dirty adjacencies
1933  long nDirtyAdjacenciesCells = 0;
1934  for (const auto &entry : m_alteredCells) {
1935  AlterationFlags cellAlterationFlags = entry.second;
1936  if (!testAlterationFlags(cellAlterationFlags, FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY)) {
1937  continue;
1938  }
1939 
1940  ++nDirtyAdjacenciesCells;
1941  }
1942 
1943  // Sort the cells beased on their tree level
1944  int maxLevel = m_tree->getMaxDepth();
1945  size_t averageSize = nDirtyAdjacenciesCells / (maxLevel + 1);
1946  std::vector<std::vector<long>> hierarchicalCellIds(maxLevel + 1);
1947  for (int level = 0; level <= maxLevel; ++level) {
1948  hierarchicalCellIds[level].reserve(averageSize);
1949  }
1950 
1951  for (const auto &entry : m_alteredCells) {
1952  AlterationFlags cellAlterationFlags = entry.second;
1953  if (!testAlterationFlags(cellAlterationFlags, FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY)) {
1954  continue;
1955  }
1956 
1957  long cellId = entry.first;
1958  int cellLevel = getCellLevel(cellId);
1959  hierarchicalCellIds[cellLevel].push_back(cellId);
1960  }
1961 
1962  // Update the adjacencies
1963  FaceInfoSet processedFaces;
1964  processedFaces.reserve(nDirtyAdjacenciesCells * getDimension());
1965 
1966  for (int level = 0; level <= maxLevel; ++level) {
1967  for (long cellId : hierarchicalCellIds[level]) {
1968  Cell &cell = m_cells[cellId];
1969  OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(cellId);
1970  for (int face = 0; face < nCellFaces; ++face) {
1971  FaceInfo currentFaceInfo(cellId, face);
1972  if (processedFaces.count(currentFaceInfo) > 0) {
1973  continue;
1974  }
1975 
1976  // Find cell neighbours
1977  std::vector<uint32_t> neighTreeIds;
1978  std::vector<bool> neighGhostFlags;
1979  if (octantInfo.internal) {
1980  m_tree->findNeighbours(octantInfo.id, face, 1, neighTreeIds, neighGhostFlags);
1981  } else {
1982  m_tree->findGhostNeighbours(octantInfo.id, face, 1, neighTreeIds, neighGhostFlags);
1983  }
1984 
1985  // Set the adjacencies
1986  //
1987  // Adjacencies will processed twice, once while processing the
1988  // current cell, and once while processing the neighbour cell.
1989  // However they will be set only once, because the function that
1990  // insert the adjacency in the cell will insert only unique
1991  // adjacencies.
1992  int nNeighs = neighTreeIds.size();
1993  for (int k = 0; k < nNeighs; ++k) {
1994  OctantInfo neighOctantInfo(neighTreeIds[k], !neighGhostFlags[k]);
1995  long neighId = getOctantId(neighOctantInfo);
1996 
1997  // Set cell data
1998  cell.pushAdjacency(face, neighId);
1999 
2000  // Set neighbour data
2001  int neighFace = oppositeFace[face];
2002  Cell &neigh = m_cells[neighId];
2003  neigh.pushAdjacency(neighFace, cellId);
2004 
2005  FaceInfo neighFaceInfo(neighId, neighFace);
2006  processedFaces.insert(neighFaceInfo);
2007  }
2008  }
2009  }
2010  }
2011 }
2012 
2018 bool VolOctree::_markCellForRefinement(long id)

2020  return setMarker(id, 1);
2021 }

2028 bool VolOctree::_markCellForCoarsening(long id)
2029 {
2030  return setMarker(id, -1);

2040 {

2042 }

2050 adaption::Marker VolOctree::_getCellAdaptionMarker(long id)
2051 {
2052  OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(id);
2053  if (!octantInfo.internal) {
2054  return adaption::MARKER_UNDEFINED;
2055  }
2056 
2057  int8_t treeMarker = m_tree->getMarker(octantInfo.id);
2058  if (treeMarker > 0) {
2059  return adaption::MARKER_REFINE;
2060  } else if (treeMarker < 0) {
2061  return adaption::MARKER_COARSEN;
2062  } else {
2063  return adaption::MARKER_NONE;
2064  }
2065 }

2076  if (!octantInfo.internal) {
2077  return false;
2078  }

2080  m_tree->setMarker(octantInfo.id, value);
2081 
2082  return true;
2083 }

2110 bool VolOctree::isPointInside(const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
2111 {
2112  bool isGhost;
2113 
2114  return (m_tree->getPointOwner(point, isGhost) != nullptr);
2115 }
2116 
2124 bool VolOctree::isPointInside(long id, const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
2125 {
2126  const Cell &cell = m_cells[id];
2127  ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
2128 
2129  int lowerLeftVertex = 0;
2130  int upperRightVertex = pow(2, getDimension()) - 1;
2131 
2132  const std::array<double, 3> &lowerLeft = getVertexCoords(cellVertexIds[lowerLeftVertex]);
2133  const std::array<double, 3> &upperRight = getVertexCoords(cellVertexIds[upperRightVertex]);
2134 
2135  const double EPS = getTol();
2136  for (int d = 0; d < 3; ++d){
2137  if (point[d] < lowerLeft[d] - EPS || point[d] > upperRight[d] + EPS) {
2138  return false;
2139  }
2140  }
2141 
2142  return true;
2143 }
2144 
2155 long VolOctree::locatePoint(const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
2156 {
2157  bool isGhost;
2158  uint32_t treeId = m_tree->getPointOwnerIdx(point, isGhost);
2159  if (treeId == std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max()) {
2160  return Element::NULL_ID;
2161  }
2162 
2163  OctantInfo octantInfo(treeId, !isGhost);
2164  return getOctantId(octantInfo);
2165 }

2202 
2208 void VolOctree::_dump(std::ostream &stream) const
2209 {
2210  // List all octants
2211  std::size_t nOctants = m_tree->getNumOctants();
2212  std::size_t nGhostsOctants = m_tree->getNumGhosts();
2213 
2214  std::vector<OctantInfo> octantInfoList;
2215  octantInfoList.reserve(nOctants + nGhostsOctants);
2216 
2217  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nOctants; ++n) {
2218  octantInfoList.emplace_back(n, true);
2219  }
2220 
2221  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nGhostsOctants; ++n) {
2222  octantInfoList.emplace_back(n, false);
2223  }
2224 
2225  // Dump tree data
2226  m_tree->dump(stream);
2227 
2228  // Dump kernel of vertex's containers
2229  //
2230  // We want the kernel state to be kept after the restore.
2231  m_vertices.dumpKernel(stream);
2232 
2233  // Dump kernel of cell's containers
2234  //
2235  // We want the kernel state to be kept after the restore.
2236  m_cells.dumpKernel(stream);
2237 
2238  // Dump vertex information
2239  //
2240  // This indexes will be read when importing the cells to keep the
2241  // association between numeration of tree vertices and patch vertices.
2242  std::unordered_set<long> dumpedVertices;
2243  dumpedVertices.reserve(getVertexCount());
2244  for (const OctantInfo &octantInfo : octantInfoList) {
2245  const Cell &cell = m_cells.at(getOctantId(octantInfo));
2246  ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
2247  for (int k = 0; k < m_cellTypeInfo->nVertices; ++k) {
2248  long vertexId = cellVertexIds[k];
2249  if (dumpedVertices.count(vertexId) == 0) {
2250  utils::binary::write(stream, vertexId);
2251 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2252  utils::binary::write(stream, getVertexRank(vertexId));
2253 #else
2254  int dummyRank = 0;
2255  utils::binary::write(stream, dummyRank);
2256 #endif
2257  dumpedVertices.insert(vertexId);
2258  }
2259  }
2260  }
2261 
2262  // Dump cell information
2263  //
2264  // This indexes will be read when importing the cells to keep the
2265  // association between numeration of tree octants and patch cells.
2266  for (const OctantInfo &octantInfo : octantInfoList) {
2267  utils::binary::write(stream, getOctantId(octantInfo));
2268  }
2269 
2270  for (const Cell &cell : getCells()) {
2271  utils::binary::write(stream, cell.getPID());
2272  }
2273 
2274  // Dump interfaces
2275  dumpInterfaces(stream);
2276 }
2277 
2283 void VolOctree::_restore(std::istream &stream)
2284 {
2285  // Restore tree
2286 #if ENABLE_MPI==1
2287  m_tree->setComm(getCommunicator());
2288 #endif
2289  m_tree->restore(stream);
2290 
2291  // Restore kernel of vertex's containers
2292  m_vertices.restoreKernel(stream);
2293 
2294  // Restore kernel of cell's containers
2295  m_cells.restoreKernel(stream);
2296 
2297  // Activate expert mode
2298  setExpert(true);
2299 
2300  // Restore cells
2301  size_t nOctants = m_tree->getNumOctants();
2302  size_t nGhostsOctants = m_tree->getNumGhosts();
2303 
2304  StitchInfo stitchInfo;
2305 
2306  std::vector<OctantInfo> octantInfoList;
2307  octantInfoList.reserve(nOctants + nGhostsOctants);
2308  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nOctants; ++n) {
2309  octantInfoList.emplace_back(n, true);
2310  }
2311  for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nGhostsOctants; ++n) {
2312  octantInfoList.emplace_back(n, false);
2313  }
2314 
2315  importCells(octantInfoList, stitchInfo, &stream);
2316 
2317  // Restore interfaces
2318  restoreInterfaces(stream);
2319 
2320  // De-activate expert mode
2321  setExpert(false);
2322 
2323  //
2324  // Restore bounding box
2325  //
2326  // The bounding box is frozen, it is necessary to update it manually.
2327  setBoundingBox();
2328 }
2329

2339  return octantInfo.id;

2362 void VolOctree::setOrigin(const std::array<double, 3> &origin)

2373 void VolOctree::translate(const std::array<double, 3> &translation)
2374 {
2375  m_tree->setOrigin(m_tree->getOrigin() + translation);
2376 
2377  VolumeKernel::translate(translation);
2378 
2379  // The bounding box is frozen, it is not updated automatically
2380  setBoundingBox();
2381 }

2388 double VolOctree::getLength() const
2389 {

2391 }
2392 
2398 void VolOctree::setLength(double length)
2399 {
2400  // Set the length
2401  m_tree->setL(length);
2402 
2403  // Set the new bounding box
2404  setBoundingBox();
2405 
2406  // If needed, update the discretization
2407  if (m_vertices.size() > 0) {
2408  // Create tree connectivity
2409  m_tree->computeConnectivity();
2410 
2411  // Update vertex coordinates
2412  std::unordered_set<long> alreadyEvaluated;
2413  for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
2414  OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(cell.getId());
2415  Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
2416  ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
2417  for (int k = 0; k < m_cellTypeInfo->nVertices; ++k) {
2418  long vertexId = cellVertexIds[k];
2419  if (alreadyEvaluated.count(vertexId) == 0) {
2420  Vertex &vertex = m_vertices.at(vertexId);
2421  vertex.setCoords(m_tree->getNode(octant, k));
2422  alreadyEvaluated.insert(vertexId);
2423  }
2424  }
2425  }
2426 
2427  // Destroy tree connectivity
2428  m_tree->clearConnectivity();
2429  }
2430 }
2431 
2438 void VolOctree::scale(const std::array<double, 3> &scaling, const std::array<double, 3> &center)
2439 {
2440  bool uniformScaling = true;
2441  uniformScaling &= (std::abs(scaling[0] - scaling[1]) > 1e-14);
2442  uniformScaling &= (std::abs(scaling[0] - scaling[2]) > 1e-14);
2443  assert(uniformScaling);
2444  if (!uniformScaling) {
2445  log::cout() << "VolOctree patch only allows uniform scaling." << std::endl;
2446  return;
2447  }
2448 
2449  std::array<double, 3> origin = m_tree->getOrigin();
2450  for (int n = 0; n < 3; ++n) {
2451  origin[n] = center[n] + scaling[n] * (origin[n] - center[n]);
2452  }
2453  m_tree->setOrigin(origin);
2454 
2455  m_tree->setL(m_tree->getL() * scaling[0]);
2456 
2457  VolumeKernel::scale(scaling, center);
2458 
2459  // The bounding box is frozen, it is not updated automatically
2460  setBoundingBox();
2461 }
2462 
2476 void VolOctree::_findCellNeighs(long id, const std::vector<long> &blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
2477 {
2478  OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(id);
2479 
2480  int dimension = getDimension();
2481  std::array<uint8_t, 4> nCodimensionItems;
2482  nCodimensionItems[0] = 0;
2483  nCodimensionItems[1] = m_tree->getNfaces();
2484  if (dimension == 3) {
2485  nCodimensionItems[2] = m_tree->getNedges();
2486  }
2487  nCodimensionItems[dimension] = m_tree->getNnodes();
2488 
2489  std::vector<uint32_t> neighTreeIds;
2490  std::vector<bool> neighGhostFlags;
2491  for(uint8_t codim = 1; codim <= dimension; ++codim){
2492  for(int item = 0; item < nCodimensionItems[codim]; ++item){
2493  if (octantInfo.internal) {
2494  m_tree->findNeighbours(octantInfo.id, item, codim, neighTreeIds, neighGhostFlags);
2495  } else {
2496  m_tree->findGhostNeighbours(octantInfo.id, item, codim, neighTreeIds, neighGhostFlags);
2497  }
2498 
2499  int nNeighs = neighTreeIds.size();
2500  for (int i = 0; i < nNeighs; ++i) {
2501  OctantInfo neighOctantInfo(neighTreeIds[i], !neighGhostFlags[i]);
2502  long neighId = getOctantId(neighOctantInfo);
2503 
2504  if (utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(neighId, blackList) == blackList.end()) {
2505  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *neighs);
2506  }
2507  }
2508  }
2509  }
2510 }
2511 
2526 void VolOctree::_findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, int edge, const std::vector<long> &blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
2527 {
2528  assert(isThreeDimensional());
2529  if (!isThreeDimensional()) {
2530  return;
2531  }
2532 
2533  // Get octant info
2534  const OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(id);
2535 
2536  // Get edge neighbours
2537  int codimension = getDimension() - 1;
2538  findOctantCodimensionNeighs(octantInfo, edge, codimension, blackList, neighs);
2539 
2540  // Add face neighbours
2541  //
2542  // Get all face neighbours and select the ones that contains the edge
2543  // for which the neighbours are requested. To correctly consider these
2544  // neighbours, the following logic can be used:
2545  // - if a face/edge neighbour has the same level or a lower level than
2546  // the current cell, then it certainly is also a vertex neighbour;
2547  // - if a face/edge neighbour has a higher level than the current cell,
2548  // it is necessary to check if the neighbour actually contains the
2549  // edge.
2550  //
2551  std::vector<long> faceNeighs;
2552  const Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
2553  int octantLevel = m_tree->getLevel(octant);
2554  for (int face : m_octantLocalFacesOnEdge[edge]) {
2555  faceNeighs.clear();
2556  _findCellFaceNeighs(id, face, blackList, &faceNeighs);
2557  for (long neighId : faceNeighs) {
2558  const OctantInfo neighOctantInfo = getCellOctant(neighId);
2559  const Octant *neighOctant = getOctantPointer(neighOctantInfo);
2560  int neighOctantLevel = m_tree->getLevel(neighOctant);
2561  if (neighOctantLevel <= octantLevel) {
2562  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *neighs);
2563  } else if (m_tree->isEdgeOnOctant(octant, edge, neighOctant)) {
2564  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *neighs);
2565  }
2566  }
2567  }
2568 }
2569 
2582 void VolOctree::_findCellVertexNeighs(long id, int vertex, const std::vector<long> &blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
2583 {
2584  // Get octant info
2585  const OctantInfo octantInfo = getCellOctant(id);
2586 
2587  // Get vertex neighbours
2588  int codimension = getDimension();
2589  findOctantCodimensionNeighs(octantInfo, vertex, codimension, blackList, neighs);
2590 
2591  // Add edge and face neighbours
2592  //
2593  // Get all face and edge neighbours and select the ones that contains the
2594  // vertex for which the neighbours are requested. On un-balanced trees
2595  // the vertex can be inside the face/edge of the neighbour (hanging nodes).
2596  // To correctly consider these neighbours, the following logic can be
2597  // used:
2598  // - if a face/edge neighbour has the same level or a lower level than
2599  // the current cell, then it certainly is also a vertex neighbour;
2600  // - if a face/edge neighbour has a higher level than the current cell,
2601  // it is necessary to check if the neighbour actually contains the
2602  // vertex.
2603  //
2604  // NOTE: in three dimension the function "_findCellEdgeNeighs" will return
2605  // both edge and face neighbours.
2606  const Octant *octant = getOctantPointer(octantInfo);
2607  int octantLevel = m_tree->getLevel(octant);
2608  if (isThreeDimensional()) {
2609  std::vector<long> edgeNeighs;
2610  for (int edge : m_octantLocalEdgesOnVertex[vertex]) {
2611  edgeNeighs.clear();
2612  _findCellEdgeNeighs(id, edge, blackList, &edgeNeighs);
2613  for (long neighId : edgeNeighs) {
2614  const OctantInfo neighOctantInfo = getCellOctant(neighId);
2615  const Octant *neighOctant = getOctantPointer(neighOctantInfo);
2616  int neighOctantLevel = m_tree->getLevel(neighOctant);
2617  if (neighOctantLevel <= octantLevel) {
2618  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *neighs);
2619  } else if (m_tree->isNodeOnOctant(octant, vertex, neighOctant)) {
2620  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *neighs);
2621  }
2622  }
2623  }
2624  } else {
2625  std::vector<long> faceNeighs;
2626  for (int face : m_octantLocalFacesOnVertex[vertex]) {
2627  faceNeighs.clear();
2628  _findCellFaceNeighs(id, face, blackList, &faceNeighs);
2629  for (long neighId : faceNeighs) {
2630  const OctantInfo neighOctantInfo = getCellOctant(neighId);
2631  const Octant *neighOctant = getOctantPointer(neighOctantInfo);
2632  int neighOctantLevel = m_tree->getLevel(neighOctant);
2633  if (neighOctantLevel <= octantLevel) {
2634  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *neighs);
2635  } else if (m_tree->isNodeOnOctant(octant, vertex, neighOctant)) {
2636  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *neighs);
2637  }
2638  }
2639  }
2640  }
2641 }
2642 
2658 void VolOctree::findOctantCodimensionNeighs(const OctantInfo &octantInfo, int index, int codimension,
2659  const std::vector<long> &blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
2660 {
2661  int dimension = getDimension();
2662  if (codimension > dimension || codimension <= 0) {
2663  return;
2664  }
2665 
2666  std::vector<uint32_t> neighTreeIds;
2667  std::vector<bool> neighGhostFlags;
2668  if (octantInfo.internal) {
2669  m_tree->findNeighbours(octantInfo.id, index, codimension, neighTreeIds, neighGhostFlags);
2670  } else {
2671  m_tree->findGhostNeighbours(octantInfo.id, index, codimension, neighTreeIds, neighGhostFlags);
2672  }
2673 
2674  int nNeighs = neighTreeIds.size();
2675  for (int i = 0; i < nNeighs; ++i) {
2676  OctantInfo neighOctantInfo(neighTreeIds[i], !neighGhostFlags[i]);
2677  long neighId = getOctantId(neighOctantInfo);
2678 
2679  if (utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(neighId, blackList) == blackList.end()) {
2680  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *neighs);
2681  }
2682  }
2683 }
2684 
2685 }
